name: Footprints by HopeCorp
description:
Story:

 It finally happened. The world has reached the point when the effects of climate change are irreversible, and its impending doom is fast approaching. Brilliant minds all over the world battle to save the planet, but what can you do? Footprints™ by HopeCorp is your ally in making better choices and having a positive impact to the environment.

Mechanics:

Each of the decisions you make in your daily life can affect your happiness, health, finances, and most importantly, your carbon footprint. The app will show you multiple options you must choose from. Try and make the best decisions for yourself and the planet at the same time!
